name: Coke Maze
description:
This is a 2D horizontal breakout game. The main character of the game is a coke-addicted guy. He becomes obsessed with Coke's sugar, carbonation, and coca (early Coke contained coca). He repeatedly drinks large amounts of Coke to escape his less-than-ideal reality, eventually creating hallucinations. Players need to defeat the monster in the Coke hallucination maze by throwing bottles to find the exit.

Contributors:

Programmer: Regina Xia (Me)

Art: Ayaka & Zhou

Game Design: Regina Xia (Me) & Ayaka
